resources.string: Block the ads of the first call of the day.\ This app will make a call to your own number at midnight without any cost.\ \n\nThis app is an open source and you can find more info at About.
Please enter the following details to get started.

This app is open-sourced under GPL-2 and you can contribute it at Github.

Due to no-advert policy, the app is not available in Play Store due to one time developer fee of $25.

This app is developed by Gowtham Gopalakrishnan.
